# include <iostream>
# include <stdio.h>
# include <vector>
# include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
   int tc;
   scanf("%d",&tc);
   while(tc--)
   {
       int n,m,k;
       scanf("%d %d %d ",&n,&m,&k);
       char N[n],M[m];
       scanf("%s",&N);
       scanf("%s",&M);
       //printf("%s\n",N);
       int count=0;
       for (int i=0;i<=n-k;i++)
       {
           int j=0;
           int l=i;
           while((j<k)&&(M[j]==N[l]))
           {
               j++;
               l++;
           }
           if (j==k)
           count++;
       }
       if (count==0)
       printf("-1\n");
       else
       printf("%d\n",count);
   }
 
 
return 0;
}
